poemsDataJson.list_full: あはれとも いふべき人(ひと)は 思(おも)ほえで 身(み)のいたづらに なりぬべきかな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Surely there is none//Who will speak a pitying word//About my lost love.//Now my folly's fitting end//Is my own nothingness.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Aware to mo|Iu beki hito wa|Omooede|Mi no itazura ni|Narinu beki kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: みのいたつらに なりぬへきかな
poemsDataJson.author: 謙徳公(けんとくこう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 女に捨てられた男の、孤独な弱い心
